name: SW19
description:
i was searching every folder in my old pc looking for old memories during the lock down , and i found this game.

This is the first game i have ever created when i was kid using game maker. after so many years i still didn't make any finished game or good enough game to publish and this is the best i made so far! so i decided to publish it for first time in 2020.

since i lost my job due to virus , would be nice if you donate and help so i can update this game after 10 years or sth with much more knowledge.
